migrations.description: Migrate application projects to the new build system. Application projects that are using the '@angular-devkit/build-angular' package's 'browser' and/or 'browser-esbuild' builders will be migrated to use the new 'application' builder. You can read more about this, including known issues and limitations, here: https://angular.dev/tools/cli/build-system-migration
migrations.name: use-application-builder

migrations.description: Remove any karma configuration files that only contain the default content. The default configuration is automatically available without a specific project file.
migrations.name: remove-default-karma-config

migrations.description: Updates the 'lib' property in tsconfig files to use 'es2022' or a more modern version.
migrations.name: update-typescript-lib

migrations.description: Update 'moduleResolution' to 'bundler' in TypeScript configurations. You can read more about this, here: https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig/#moduleResolution
migrations.name: update-module-resolution

migrations.description: Converts the entire application to block control flow syntax
migrations.name: control-flow-migration

migrations.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated Router.getCurrentNavigation method with the Router.currentNavigation signal
migrations.name: router-current-navigation

migrations.description: Ensures that the Router.lastSuccessfulNavigation signal is now invoked
migrations.name: router-last-successful-navigation

migrations.description: Adds `BootstrapContext` to `bootstrapApplication` calls in `main.server.ts` to support server rendering.
migrations.name: add-bootstrap-context-to-server-main

migrations.description: Migrates deprecated bootstrap options to providers.
migrations.name: bootstrap-options-migration
